pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sahāyakassa gharaṁ gantvā tassa pajāpatiyā saddhiṁ sayanighare nisajjaṁ kappesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.3_0: Atha kho so puriso yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.3_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.4_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so puriso pajāpatiṁ etadavoca—“dadehāyyassa bhikkhan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.5_0: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa bhikkhaṁ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.6_0: Atha kho so puriso āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ etadavoca—“gacchatha, bhante, yato ayyassa bhikkhā dinnā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.7_0: Atha kho sā itthī sallakkhetvā—“pariyuṭṭhito ayaṁ puriso”ti, āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ etadavoca—“nisīdatha, bhante, mā agamitthā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.9_0: tatiyampi kho so puriso āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ etadavoca—“gacchatha, bhante, yato ayyassa bhikkhā dinnā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.10_0: Tatiyampi kho sā itthī āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ etadavoca—“nisīdatha, bhante, mā agamitthā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.11_0: Atha kho so puriso nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.12_0: “ayaṁ, bhante, ayyo upanando mayhaṁ pajāpatiyā saddhiṁ sayanighare nisinno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.13_0: So mayā uyyojīyamāno na icchati gantuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.15_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.16_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.17_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, upananda, sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.20_0: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.22_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.23.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.6_0: itthī ceva hoti puriso ca, itthī ca puriso ca ubho anikkhantā honti, ubho avītarāgā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.10_0: mahallake ghare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṁ vijahitvā nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.11_0: Khuddake ghare piṭṭhivaṁsaṁ atikkamitvā nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.1_0: Sayanighare sayanigharasaññī sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.2_0: Sayanighare vematiko sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.3_0: Sayanighare nasayanigharasaññī sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.2_0: mahallake ghare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṁ avijahitvā nisīdati,
